## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT1G03140](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT1G03140)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>PRP18a</u>
- **Gene Name:** pre-mRNA processing  factor 18a
- **Description:**   splicing factor Prp18 family protein;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** 
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*

## Plant Ontology Annotations:
   - [PO:0025195](https://browser.planteome.org/amigo/term/PO:0025195)&nbsp;---&nbsp;pollen tube cell&nbsp;---&nbsp;célula del tubo polínico (Spanish, exact), 花粉管細胞 (Japanese, exact)
   - [PO:0000293](https://browser.planteome.org/amigo/term/PO:0000293)&nbsp;---&nbsp;guard cell&nbsp;---&nbsp;célula guardiana (Spanish, exact), occlusive cell (exact), 孔辺細胞 (Japanese, exact)
## Germplasm Phenotype:
   - [CS69984]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;Low GFP protein levels relative to the wild-type T line (CS69640) due to decreased splicing of the non-canonical AT-AC intron and increased splicing of the canonical GT-AG intron in GFP pre-mRNA. Short roots and small siliques compared to CS69640.
   - [CS69984]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;Reduced silique length, reduced root length.
